citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 22-
JUN-21. Left a message at the listed contact number, waited 30 minutes at the facility and was able to speak with a
neighbor who indicated the licensee wasn't available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 22-
JUN-21.  Left a message at the listed contact number, waited 30 minutes at the facility and was able to speak with a 
neighbor who indicated the licensee wasn't available for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
